body:
Why aren't there extra allocations anymore with MKL being used?
Please remove `#if defined(INTEL_MKL) && defined(ENABLE_MKL)` now that the allocation IDs are the same for both MKL and TF. Please also update the comment to explain why they are the same.
body_html:
